title: Redeem Fail
body: I recently just bought Zed with IP and I already had a skin permanent shard from rerolling skin shards earlier. And when I click unlock permanently, it tells me redeem failed.

replies.body: I imagine it will be fixed very soon. I posted a ticket and a forum post to inform people and then saw a Rioter post a minute ago here. Everyone should be patient. It's an odd thing to happen and I'm sure with a lack of info they have some backtracking to do as to why it's broken. I feel your pain. I want my god fist lee sin. hahaha. I believe in you Riot.
Having this issue on a low level account says it's been perm added to my inventory, but when I check it hasnt & i continue to get this error http://prntscr.com/g5c06i (for the champ shards too)

Is this still an issue?  I'm looking into this now to see if there's something going on.  In the meantime, anymore info like the specifics of the error, screenshots, and what you're trying to perform in hextech can help me tons!
I went to sleep, and in the morning it let me redeem the skin shard.
Looking into this now!  In the meantime,** spamming redemption** should ~~eventually~~ hopefully budge it through.
Having same issue, any fix yet?
Look at all of us wanting/needing help, do you see any of us getting responded too/help? Nope. GG Rito.
Same! i got Omega Squad Veigar and i was so excited but this thing is making me crazy..
i tried to unlock it 87 times and still no skins, fuck this shit
Yo me too help pls. Got super lucky with pf cait https://gyazo.com/bb668435ac55fe9744e235ec6f72a84b
Samee ! i got now two skins and can not use them WTF its wrong ?
